properties.address: Altogether Care- Care At Home, Weymouth, Dorset DT4 7PY
properties.description: Our Warm Welcome space is in a large house, that we have as offices in Weymouth. The office can be busy, but there's a separate room available for you to come in and get warm, have a cuppa or even some soup to warm you on a cold day. We're open every other Thursday 2pm until 4pm, you're welcome.
properties.title: Altogether Care Weymouth Care at Home

properties.title: Crossways Library

properties.description: We are open Monday 2.30-5pm, Tuesday 10-12pm & 2-5pm, Wednesday 10-1pm & 2.30-5pm, Thursday 10-1pm, Friday 12-6pm, Saturday 10-1pm We welcome anyone to come and enjoy our warm spaces. Find a quiet corner to work, study or read. Or join in with one of our many free activities for all ages to create something, learn something, write something, read with a group, play games or just have a drink, chat and make connections with others at our Coffee companions sessions. Computer use is free. What’s on in Dorset libraries https://www.dorsetcouncil.gov.uk/whats-on-in-dorset-libraries
properties.title: Crossways Library

properties.description: Come and enjoy warmth, company and hot refreshments in a safe space at the Wednesday morning Cafe. The Lounge is also open on the last Friday of every month for refreshments and games too if you wish. We look forward to welcoming you!
